drupalNodeEvent.title: The Emerging Public Realm of the Greater Bay Area: Approaches to Public Space in a Chinese Megaregion: Book Launch and Author Panel

field_speakers.processed: Miodrag Mitrašinović, Timothy Jachna, Mary Ann O’Donnell, Juan Du, Brian McGrath, Paul Chu

field_description.processed: Editors Miodrag Mitrasinovic and Timothy Jachna and chapter authors Brian McGrath, Mark Frazier, Juan Du, Mary O'Donnell and Paul Chu will discuss ongoing transformations in public space, and its relationship to the public realm more broadly in the world’s most populous urban megaregion—the Greater Bay Area of southeastern China.
